name: Empty (biobinary)
description:
Description:
There is a state of emergency, the secret Earth base located in outer space is visited by an unknown spacecraft. Many thought that the spaceship came from different planet. You don't need to think much, your job is to destroy the spaceship quickly.

Control:
[W] / [Up Arrow] -> To Accelerate
[S] / [Down Arrow] -> To Decelerate
[LMB] / [Space] -> To Shoot
[Shift] -> To Activate Slowmotion
